data.scheme_name: General Term Loan Scheme - Partnership - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides loan assistance upto Rs. 700 lakhs  for setting up projects of eligible industrial activities for acquiring fixed assets like land, building, plant & machinery and other miscellaneous assets.
data.eligibility: All new and existing micro, small, medium enterprises for expansion/modernization/diversification/renovation are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
1. Loan Use: Creation of fixed assets or repayment of standard loans. 
  2. Mortgage Conditions: Property must not be leased/rented without Corporation’s permission. 
  3. Applicant Requirements: Provide approvals, mortgage immovable property as prime security, and hypothecate moveable assets with first charge or on pari-passu basis in consortium finance. The loan account must have been standard for the past two years.
data.beneficiaries: All new and existing micro, small, medium enterprises for expansion/modernization/diversification/renovation are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
1. The loan amount shall be utilized for creation of fixed assets, take-over/repayment of outstanding loans (only standard assets) of applicants from other banks/institutions against fixed assets acquired. 
  2. The proposed property to be mortgaged should not be presently leased out/rented out and should not be leased out/rented out in future without the permission of the Corporation. 
  3. The applicant should furnish all the required approvals and be agreeable to mortgage its immovable property as prime security and hypothecate its moveable assets with first charge to the Corporation or on pari-passu basis in case of consortium finance. 
  4. The promoters or unit must have a satisfactory repayment history, with their loan account classified as standard for the past two years, particularly for loan takeovers from other banks or financial institutions.
data.context:
1. The General Term Loan Scheme by EDC Goa provides financial assistance to businesses for acquiring fixed assets like land, buildings, and machinery. 
  2. It supports new projects, expansions, and modernization across various sectors, aiming to promote industrial development in Goa with competitive loan terms and government-backed interest rebates.
data.objective: To provide financial assistance to units for setting up projects of eligible industrial activities for acquiring fixed assets like land, building, plant & machinery and other miscellaneous assets.
data.description:
1. Scheme provides loan assistance of up to Rs. 700 lakhs, repayable within 8 years including moratorium period up to 2 years. 
  2. Term Loan Interest Rate: Loans up to Rs. 50 Lakhs and Professional Loans – 9.50% p.a.
  3. Loans above Rs.50 Lakhs – 10.50% p.a. to 13.50% p.a. Interest rates shall be floating basis and would be rest on 1st Jan & 1st July yearly. 
  4. The minimum promoter’s contribution shall be 25% of the project cost.
data.funding_mechanism: The Loan shall be disbursed after execution of legal documents and compliance of term of senction/ disbursement formalities.
data.website: Loans for Entrepreneurs | Micro, Small, Medium and Large Enterprises | EDC GOA (edc-goa.com)
data.additional_info:
1. Security: The loan must have at least 100% immovable security coverage, with a first charge on financed assets (land, building, machinery). 
  2. Additional collateral may include commercial or residential non-agricultural properties, or other acceptable securities. 
  3. Personal guarantees may be required from promoters, directors, or suitable individuals. Loans up to ₹50 lakhs secured by movable assets will require hypothecation and personal/third-party guarantees. 
  4. Processing Fees: 1% of the loan amount, up to Rs. 2 lakhs + GST. Preliminary fee: Rs. 0.10 lakhs + GST (Rs. 0.05 lakhs + GST for loans between Rs. 5–10 lakhs). Fees are non-refundable.
data.checklist_info_a:
Detailed Project Report
 Land Records
 Business proof
Term Loan Application Form
Certificate/Declaration
Biodata of the promoter/Partner/Director/Guarantor
Ownership documents of Primary, Additional  & Collateral Securities
Documents pertaining to Building / Civil works
Details of machinery proposed to be acquired
Last three years Income Tax Returns
Applicants bank details
Net worth certificate listing assets & liabilities with location details issued by Chartered Accountant (for loans above `50.00 lakhs)
Documents to be submitted post sanction of loan:
NOC from Goa IDC for land in industrial estates 
Income Tax Clearance under section 281 (1) (ii) of the Income Tax Act,1961
In case of companies:
Board Resolution
Consent letters from Directors to furnish their Personal Guarantee
Any other documents as stipulated in the Sanction Letter.
data.checklist_info_b: Goa Online, Government of Goa, India
data.beneficiary: Manufacturing and Service Industries - Partnership - Goa - All MSME and All Non-MSME
data.lifecycle: Required Credit Support for Scale - Up
